name: Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream - Extra Area: Atelier Plachta
summary: Plachta as the main character! An additional story episode with young Plachta as the main character, set in the time after she arrived in Erde Wiege and before she first met Sophie. Players will play as Plachta, with Diebold and Ramizel available as party members.
